channel.title: Electronics on Luke Jaeger
channel.description: Recent content in Electronics on Luke Jaeger

item.title: Unauthorized Personnel On The Tracks
item.description: A sort-of-anamorphic light-up box combining a printed, 3D-modeled foreground and a hand-painted background. Will probably make more things like this now that I’ve figured out the basic workflow.

item.title: Tube Cathedral 2
item.description: Another anamorphic construction, designed in OnShape CAD.

item.title: Fimbel Lab Anamorphic Logo
item.description: This was one of my first attempts to build an anamorphic object using CAD software. Come by the Mount Holyoke Makerspace some time and see it! My colleagues Kris Camp and Shani Mensing were instrumental in fabricating this thing. The original logo was designed by Joyce He.

item.title: Good Enough Frog
item.description: Designed in OnShape CAD and hand-assembled. More here. This piece was exhibited in the Parallel Play group show.
